quotes.author: Eric S. Raymond, How to become a hacker
quotes.quote: No problem should ever have to be solved twice.

quotes.author: Eric S. Raymond, How to become a hacker
quotes.quote: Attitude is no substitute for competence.

quotes.author: Alan J. Perlis (Epigrams in programming)
quotes.quote: A year spent in artificial intelligence is enough to make one believe in God.

quotes.author: Alan J. Perlis (Epigrams in programming)
quotes.quote: Within a computer natural language is unnatural.

quotes.author: Alexander Pope
quotes.quote: A little learning is a dangerous thing.

quotes.author: Roger Schank, Engines for Education
quotes.quote: There really is no learning without doing.

quotes.author: E. W. Dijkstra, The humble programmer
quotes.quote: The best way to learn to live with our limitations is to know them.

quotes.author: Alan J. Perlis
quotes.quote: The programmer must seek both perfection of part and adequacy of collection.

quotes.author: Alan J. Perlis
quotes.quote: Lisp programmers know the value of everything but the cost of nothing.

quotes.author: Albert Einstein
quotes.quote: Everything should be made as simple as possible, but no simpler.

quotes.author: Hugh Kingsmill
quotes.quote: A charlatan makes obscure what is clear; a thinker makes clear what is obscure.

quotes.author: Larry Wall (Programming Perl)
quotes.quote: The three chief virtues of a programmer are: Laziness, Impatience and Hubris.

quotes.author: Joel Spolsky (The Law of Leaky Abstractions)
quotes.quote: All non-trivial abstractions, to some degree, are leaky.

quotes.author: Guido van Rossum
quotes.quote: XML wasn't designed to be edited by humans on a regular basis.

quotes.author: Keith Devens
quotes.quote: Premature abstraction is an equally grevious sin as premature optimization.

quotes.author: Bjarne Stroustrup
quotes.quote: You can have premature generalization as well as premature optimization.

quotes.author: William Strunk, Jr. (The Elements of Style)
quotes.quote: Omit needless words.

quotes.author: Galileo Galilei
quotes.quote: I have never met a man so ignorant that I couldn't learn something from him.

quotes.author: Brave New World (paraphrased)
quotes.quote: Philosophy: the finding of bad reasons for what one believes by instinct.

quotes.author: Catwoman (The Batman TV Series, episode 83)
quotes.quote: Fools! Don't they know that tears are a woman's most effective weapon?

quotes.author: Scott McKay
quotes.quote: C++ is history repeated as tragedy. Java is history repeated as farce.

quotes.author: unknown
quotes.quote: Simplicity takes effort. Genius, even.

quotes.author: unknown
quotes.quote: Show, don't tell.

quotes.author: David (Psalm 56:4)
quotes.quote: In God I trust; I will not be afraid. What can mortal man do to me?

quotes.author: Jamie Zawinski
quotes.quote: Linux is only free if your time has no value.

quotes.author: wordpress.org
quotes.quote: Code is poetry.

quotes.author: Rush (Freewill)
quotes.quote: If you choose not to decide, you still have made a choice.

quotes.author: Cicero
quotes.quote: The function of wisdom is to discriminate between good and evil.

quotes.author: Ronald Reagan
quotes.quote: Mistakes were made.

quotes.author: Pontius Pilate
quotes.quote: What is truth?

quotes.author: Donald Campbell
quotes.quote: The direct pursuit of happiness is a recipe for an unhappy life.

quotes.author: Butler Lampson
quotes.quote: All problems in computer science can be solved by another level of indirection.

quotes.author: Aristotle
quotes.quote: For the things we have to learn before we can do them, we learn by doing them.

quotes.author: [fact]
quotes.quote: PI seconds is a nanocentury.

quotes.author: unknown
quotes.quote: Dont give users the opportunity to lock themselves.

quotes.author: unknown
quotes.quote: Only bad designers blame their failings on the users.

quotes.author: unknown
quotes.quote: When all you have is a hammer, everything looks like a nail.

quotes.author: http://www.catonmat.net
quotes.quote: Good coders code, great reuse.

quotes.author: unknown
quotes.quote: If there is a will, there is a way.

quotes.author: Super-sizing YouTube with Python (Mike Solomon, mike@youtube.com)
quotes.quote: Just like carpentry, measure twice cut once.

quotes.author: Douglas Crockford (Author of JSON and JsLint)
quotes.quote: The good thing about reinventing the wheel is that you get a round one.

quotes.author: Joesgoals.com
quotes.quote: It(mastering)’s knowing what you are doing.

quotes.author: Alan Perlis
quotes.quote: Don't have good ideas if you aren't willing to be responsible for them.

quotes.author: Rear Admiral Grace Hopper
quotes.quote: The most damaging phrase in the language is, It's always been done that way.

quotes.author: DJ MacLean
quotes.quote: The only thing a man should ever be 100% convinced of is his own ignorance.

quotes.author: Max Levchin, PayPal founder, Talk at StartupSchool2007
quotes.quote: Measure everything you can about the product, and you'll start seeing patterns.

quotes.author: Mark Ward
quotes.quote: The only constant in the world of hi-tech is change.

quotes.author: BetterExplained.com
quotes.quote: You can’t get to version 500 if you don’t start with a version 1.

quotes.author: Lao­Tzu
quotes.quote: A journey of a thousand miles must begin with a single step.

quotes.author: Ben Hoyts (micropledge)
quotes.quote: C’s great for what it’s great for.

quotes.author: Dr. Koichi Kawana
quotes.quote: Simplicity means the achievement of maximum effect with minimum means.

quotes.author: Ridderstrale & Nordstorm, Funky Business
quotes.quote: Normality is the route to nowhere.

quotes.author: H. Hardy, A mathematician's apology.
quotes.quote: Good work is no done by ‘humble’ men.

quotes.author: Dennis (blog comment)
quotes.quote: Simplicity and pragmatism beat complexity and theory any day.

quotes.author: Joss Whedon
quotes.quote: Remember, always be yourself ... unless you suck!

quotes.author: Chuck Norris(?)
quotes.quote: All great things require great dedication.

quotes.author: smoothspan.com
quotes.quote: Making All Software Into Tools Reduces Risk.

quotes.author: Earl of Chesterfield
quotes.quote: Whatever is worth doing at all, is worth doing well.

quotes.author: Voltaire
quotes.quote: The best is the enemy of the good.

quotes.author: Phil Dourado
quotes.quote: Only make new mistakes.

quotes.author: William Shakespeare, "Henry VI"
quotes.quote: Talkers are no good doers.

quotes.author: Eric Hamilton
quotes.quote: Photography is painting with light.

quotes.author: Pablo Picasso
quotes.quote: Good artists copy. Great artists steal.

quotes.author: Seneca
quotes.quote: Every man prefers belief to the exercise of judgment.

quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson
quotes.quote: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.

quotes.author: George Burns
quotes.quote: Don't stay in bed, unless you can make money in bed.

quotes.author: Mario Andretti
quotes.quote: If everything seems under control, you're not going fast enough.

quotes.author: Louis Pasteur
quotes.quote: Chance favors the prepared mind.

quotes.author: Brian Kernigan
quotes.quote: Controlling complexity is the essence of computer programming.

quotes.author: Grady Booch
quotes.quote: The function of good software is to make the complex appear to be simple.

quotes.author: L. Peter Deutsch
quotes.quote: To iterate is human, to recurse divine.

quotes.author: Linus Torvalds
quotes.quote: Software is like sex: It’s better when it’s free.

quotes.author: Charles H. Duell, Commissioner, U.S. Office of Patents, 1899
quotes.quote: Everything that can be invented has been invented.

quotes.author: Thomas J. Watson, Chairman of the Board, IBM, circa 1948
quotes.quote: I think there’s a world market for about 5 computers.

quotes.author:
Engineer at the Advanced Computing Systems Division of IBM,
commenting on the microchip, 1968
quotes.quote: But what is it good for?

quotes.author: Ken Olson, President, Digital Equipment Corporation, 1977
quotes.quote: There is no reason for any individual to have a computer in his home.

quotes.author: Bill Gates, 1981
quotes.quote: 640K ought to be enough for anybody.

quotes.author: Frank Lloyd Wright
quotes.quote: If it keeps up, man will atrophy all his limbs but the push-button finger.

quotes.author: John Foderaro
quotes.quote: Lisp is a programmable programming language.

quotes.author: Arthur C. Clarke
quotes.quote: Any sufficiently advanced technology is undistinguishable from magic.

quotes.author: Malcolm Gladwell, Who says big ideas are rare?
quotes.quote: Good ideas are out there for anyone with the wit and the will to find them.

quotes.author: Donald Knuth
quotes.quote: Beware of bugs in the above code; I have only proved it correct, not tried it.

quotes.author: Alan Kay
quotes.quote: Simple things should be simple. Complex things should be possible.

quotes.author: Alan Kay
quotes.quote: All creativity is an extended form of a joke.

quotes.author: Winston Churchill
quotes.quote: However beautiful the strategy, you should occasionally look at the results.

quotes.author: Thomas Edison
quotes.quote: Genius is 1% inspiration and 99% perspiration.

quotes.author: Richard Sites
quotes.quote: I’d rather write programs to write programs than write programs.

quotes.author: Vim user manual
quotes.quote: :nunmap can also be used outside of a monastery.

quotes.author: Tim Gallwey, The inner game of work
quotes.quote: I had to learn how to teach less, so that more could be learned.

quotes.author: Ted Kennedy
quotes.quote: The Work Begins Anew, The Hope Rises Again, And The Dream Lives On.

quotes.author: Donald Norman
quotes.quote: The hardest part of design ... is keeping features out.

quotes.author: Ralph Johnson
quotes.quote: Before software can be reusable it first has to be usable.

quotes.author: Elie Wiesel
quotes.quote: The opposite of love is not hate, it is indifference.

quotes.author: Colin Powell
quotes.quote: Perpetual optimism is a force multiplier.

quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi
quotes.quote: Be the change you want to see in the world.

quotes.author: Cited by Randy Pausch
quotes.quote: Experience is what you get when you don't get what you want.

quotes.author: Randy Pausch
quotes.quote: Luck is where preparation meets opportunity.

quotes.author: J. B. Bossuet, Politics from Holy Writ, 1709
quotes.quote: The greatest of all weaknesses is the fear of appearing weak.

quotes.author: Rear Admiral Dr. Grace Hopper
quotes.quote: It's easier to ask forgiveness than it is to get permission.

quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin
quotes.quote: An investment in knowledge always pays the best interest.

quotes.author: pigsandfishes.com
quotes.quote: Never do the impossible. People will expect you to do it forever after.

quotes.author: How to fail: 25 secrets learned through failure
quotes.quote: Give up control. You never really had it anyway.

quotes.author: Albert Einstein
quotes.quote: The important thing is not to stop questioning.

quotes.author: Buddha
quotes.quote: Do not accept anything because it comes from the mouth of a respected person.

quotes.author: Eric S. Raymond, How To Be A Hacker
quotes.quote: Work as intensely as you play and play as intensely as you work.

quotes.author: Voltaire
quotes.quote: A witty saying proves nothing

quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt
quotes.quote: Nobody can make you feel inferior without your consent.

quotes.author: Mark Twain
quotes.quote: If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything.

quotes.author: Elie Wiesel
quotes.quote: The opposite of love is not hate, it's indifference.

quotes.author: John Lennon
quotes.quote: Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans.

quotes.author: George Leonard, Mastery.
quotes.quote: In terms of energy, it's better to make a wrong choice than none at all.

quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway
quotes.quote: Courage is grace under pressure.

quotes.author: George Leonard, Mastery.
quotes.quote: Are you willing to wear your white belt?
